titleStmt.title: The humble petition of the Lord Mayor, Aldermen, and Commons of the city of London in Common Council assembled as it was presented to His Majesty in council at Windsor, upon Monday the 18th of June, 1683 : together with the Lord Keeper's speech.
titleStmt.author: City of London (England). Court of Common Council.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by the assigns of John Bill, deceas'd and by Henry Hills, and Thomas Newcomb ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
